bill.title: State boards and commissions; bring forward for amendment purposes.
bill.description: An Act To Bring Forward Sections 69-7-101 (central Market Board), 41-111-1 (child Death Review Panel), 19-5-333 (commercial Mobile Radio Service Board), 45-39-3 (crime Stoppers Advisory Council), 37-21-51 (early Learning Collaboration Grant Program), 73-69-21 (electronic Protection Licensing Advisory Board), 43-13-409 (health Care Trust Fund), 41-73-7 (mississippi Hospital Equipment Facilities Authority), 57-83-1 (mississippi Technology Alliance Liaison Committee) And 43-59-3 (mississippi Commission On The Status Of Women), Mississippi Code Of 1972, And Chapter 1019, Local And Private Laws Of 2004 (capitol City Convention Center Commission),for Purposes Of Amendment; And For Related Purposes.
